commands.name: az logic workflow create
commands.syntax:
az logic workflow create --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--access-control]
                         [--definition]
                         [--endpoints-configuration]
                         [--integration-account]
                         [--integration-service-environment]
                         [--location]
                         [--mi-system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--mi-user-assigned]
                         [--state {Completed, Deleted, Disabled, Enabled, NotSpecified, Suspended}]
                         [--tags]
examples: az logic workflow create --resource-group rg --name workflow --definition workflow.json

commands.name: az logic workflow delete
examples: az logic workflow delete --resource-group rg --name workflow

commands.name: az logic workflow generate-upgraded-definition
commands.summary: Generates the upgraded definition for a workflow.

commands.name: az logic workflow show
examples: az logic workflow show --resource-group rg --name workflow

commands.name: az logic workflow update
commands.syntax:
az logic workflow update --name
                         --resource-group
                         [--add]
                         [--definition]
                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                         [--location]
                         [--remove]
                         [--set]
                         [--state {Completed, Deleted, Disabled, Enabled, NotSpecified, Suspended}]
                         [--tags]
examples: az logic workflow update --resource-group rg --name workflow --definition workflow.json
